00026 enum GammaResponseModels{
00027     GR_Test                                     = 1,                    /* no parameters */
00028     GR_GeneralTarget            = 2,                    /* */
00029     GR_Radioluminescence        = 3,                    /* 0 - Smax, 1 - D0, 2 - dyn */
00030     GR_ExpSaturation            = 4,                    /* 0 - Smax, 1 - D0 */
00031     GR_LinQuad                          = 5                             /* 0 - alpha, 1 - beta */
00032 };
00033 
00034 enum RDDModels{
00035         RDD_Test                                = 1,                    /* no parameters */
00036         RDD_KatzPoint                   = 2,                    /* parameters: 0 - r_min [m] (lower integration limit), 1 - d_min_Gy (lower dose cut-off) */
00037         RDD_Geiss                               = 3,                    /* parameters: 0 - a0 [m] (core diameter) */
00038         RDD_Site                                = 4,                    /* parameters: 0 - a0 [m] (core diameter), 1 - d_min_Gy (lower dose cut-off)  */ // after Edmund et al., 2007, but modified with dose-cut off
00039         RDD_ExtTarget                   = 5                             /* parameters: 0 - r_min [m] (core diameter), 1 - a0 [m] (target diameter), 2 - D_min [Gy] (cut-off dose) */ //as defined in Edmund et al. , 2007
00040 };
